text: Žarko Potočnjak (3 February 1946 – 21 October 2021) was a Croatian actor. He was born in Pakrac, PR Croatia, FPR Yugoslavia. His career began in 1966. He was known for his roles in Visitors from the Galaxy, The Glembays and Go, Yellow. He was also the voice of Mater in the Croatian dub of the Cars movies. Potočnjak died on 21 October 2021 in Zagreb, Croatia at the age of 75.Preminuo je glumac Žarko Potočnjak ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1946 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Croatian actors
title: Žarko Potočnjak
